replies.msg:
成功卡關，calico crashloopbackoff
https://gist.github.com/ruanbekker/38a38aea5f325f7fa4a19e795ef4f0d0

time="2018-12-24T14:07:23Z" level=info msg="Unhandled error: client: etcd cluster is unavailable or misconfigured; error #0: dial tcp 192.168.1.111:6666: getsockopt: connection refused
"
time="2018-12-24T14:07:23Z" level=info msg="Unable to query node configuration" Name=k2 error="client: etcd cluster is unavailable or misconfigured; error #0: dial tcp 192.168.1.111:6666: getsockopt: connection refused
"

用https://docs.projectcalico.org/v3.4/getting-started/kubernetes/installation/calico#installing-with-the-kubernetes-api-datastore50-nodes-or-less解決左，之後要搞
1. storage (ceph? gluster?)
2. 試deploy postgres cluster
3. 試deploy redis cluster
4. 試行cronjob worker
5. 試dev+deploy一個駁postgres + redis既node.js app
6. 用屋企gitlab駁落去試auto devops + serverless
